content: this legal case involves two parties who coowned a property in virovitica in 2017 a resolution was made to dissolve the coownership and sell the property through a public auction the proceeds would be distributed according to the coownership ratios with one party owning 13 and the other party owning 23 the case has been ongoing since may 13 2021 and is currently being heard in the county court zadar a construction expert determined that the property consists of a residentialcommercial building and an economic building with a total land area of 437 m² the expert suggests that the property can be physically divided based on coownership shares but certain administrative requirements need to be met the petitioner proposes dissolving the coownership and establishing condominium ownership with a 23 share for the petitioner and a 13 share for the other party the court is considering the market value of the property and the possibility of physical division initially the petitioner agreed to the physical division but later opposed it the court is now examining the coownership ratio and considering either a geometric division or selling the property at a public auction to dissolve the coownership
